name: Halloween Shooter Deluxe
description:
Halloween Shooter Deluxe is best bubble shooting game. Halloween Shooter Deluxe is the most classic and addictive bubble buster game. Try to make combination of three or more same colored bubbles to make them burst. Shoot bubbles at right place to make combination to burst maximum bubbles to clear the top and to score maximum. Halloween Shooter deluxe is amazing arcade puzzle bubble shooting game.

Game Features:
- Best Bubble Shooting Control
- Amazing Game Graphics
- Nice Gaming Music
- Interesting Bubble Shooting Puzzle gaming levels

How to Play:
Just tap at right place to shoot the bubble. Make combination of three or more same colored bubbles to make them burst. Try to clear the top by shooting bubbles and by making combinations to score maximum.
